title: Bans
body:
Feel as if the punishments for afking are a bit harsh, Especially when half the time it isn't due to people actually afking, I understand no one likes an afk, but regardless, the Punishment is a bit too harsh, my computer BSOD straight away after a loading screen (Ranked game), I returned 8 Minutes later only to carry my team to Victory, and in return I was rewarded with a 20 Minute wait timer for 5 Matches, this is the third time I've been in situation like this, is there no way to try and make the banner a little more accurate to those who actually deserve the punishment? Surely. 
~Just thought i'd complain a little, Bronze4lyf.{{champion:11}}
